conbody.p: Concepts are intended for descriptive content. You can put whatever you want inside of a conbody, but in general, you should stick to conceptual information. All the background about how a thing works.
If you want to describe how to do a thing, use a task topic. If you want to describe details about the values allowed in a dialog box, use a reference topic.
